General.Name: Bigben Interactive
General.Description: BigBen Interactive designs, produces, and distributes accessories for video game consoles, and smartphones and tablets in France and internationally. It offers audio products; technical support services; accessories, such as controllers, headsets, keyboards, mice, microphones, memory cards, protections, bags, etc. The company also develops, publishes, and distributes video games; and provides technical support services. BigBen Interactive was incorporated in 1981 and is headquartered in Lesquin, France.
General.Address: 396, Rue de la Voyette, Lesquin, France, 59818
